6*p62790a0616* do not write in this area do not write in this area do not write in this area2 the flow chart shows how garlic root tips can be treated to observe mitosis in the root cells.step 1root tips were placed in hydrochloric acid in a water bath at 55 c, left for five minutes and then rinsed with waterstep 2root tips were then placed in acetic orcein in a water bath at 55 c and left for five minutesstep 3root tips were placed on a microscope slide and broken apart using mounted needlesstep 4a coverslip was placed over the root tips and squashed gentlystep 5the slide was then viewed first using low power and then high power of a microscope

12*p62790a01216* do not write in this area do not write in this area do not write in this area3 antimicrobial chemicals can be used in food preservation to reduce the risk of food poisoning. antimicrobial chemicals derived from plants may be used in food preservation. an investigation was carried out to assess the antimicrobial properties of extracts from five plants: clove, cumin, ginger, pomegranate and thyme. two types of bacteria were used, type a and type b. filter paper discs were placed in each extract for 10 minutes and then allowed to dry. five discs, one for each extract, were placed onto an agar plate spread with bacteria of type a.  this was repeated for bacteria of type b. a control disc was added to each plate. the diagram shows one agar plate after this procedure was completed.                                                                           disc with extractagar spread with bacteriacontrol disc these plates were kept at 5 c for two hours, and then incubated at 30 c for 24 hours.

(a) (i) state the dependent variable in this investigation.(1)  (ii) suggest why the plates were kept at 5 c, before they were incubated.(1)
